title: Whap Configuration
description: Configuration file for Whap WhatsApp Mock Server

webhookUrls.description: Array of webhook URLs to receive WhatsApp webhook events. Can be URLs (fallback) or phoneNumber:URL mappings

items.description: Either a URL (e.g., 'http://localhost:3000/webhook') or phone:URL mapping (e.g., '1234567890:http://localhost:3000/webhook')

phoneNumbers.description: Map of phone number IDs to their display information

displayPhoneNumber.description: The display phone number for this phone number ID
